title: Puri x Puri: Himegimi wa Ouji-sama
original_name: プリ × プリ ～姫君は王子さま～
sinopse:
Kaguya Yuki is an ex-member of the idol group Kirakira _ Moon. Set up by the other members who were jealous of her popularity, Yuki was banished from the entertainment world. She vows to make a come-back to take revenge against Kira _ Moon!! …But for some reason, she ended up becoming a member of the male idol group ZAST as a new male member, Fuyutsuki Kaguya...!?

(Source: Aerandria)
